de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl

Class FMFactoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.ExtensionManager<IFeatureModelFactory>
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl.FMFactoryManager

  • public final class FMFactoryManager
extends ExtensionManager<IFeatureModelFactory>
    Returns custom factories to create IFeatureModel, IFeature, and IConstraint instances.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter

      • getFactoryById

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getFactoryById(java.lang.String id)
                                           throws ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException
        Returns a specific factory associated with the string id. By default, the following factories are available:
        • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.DefaultFeatureModelFactory: An instance of DefaultFeatureModelFactory
        • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.ExtendedFeatureModelFactory: An instance of ExtendedFeatureModelFactory
        Parameters:
        id - the (unique) identifier for an instance of IFeatureModelFactory to be returned
        Returns:
        Returns Instance of feature model factory associated with id, or throws RuntimeException in case id is not known
        Throws:
        NoSuchExtensionException - If no factory with the given ID is registered.
        ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException

      • setDefaultFactory

        public static void setDefaultFactory(java.lang.String id)
                              throws ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException
        Throws:
        ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException

      • getFactoryWorkspace

        public static FactoryWorkspace getFactoryWorkspace()

      • getFactoryWorkspace

        public static FactoryWorkspace getFactoryWorkspace(java.lang.String path)

      • getFactory

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getFactory(IFeatureModel featureModel)
        Returns the feature model factory that was used to create the given model. (if the factory is not available the default factory is returned).
        Parameters:
        featureModel - the feature model
        Returns:
        Returns the feature model factory for the given feature model.

      • getDefaultFactory

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getDefaultFactory()
        Return the currently set default factory (if not changed, it is an instance of the built-in DefaultFeatureModelFactory).

        Important Note: If possible, use getFactory(String, IPersistentFormat) or getFactory(IFeatureModel) instead to ensure that the correct factory is used for the underlying feature model file.
        Returns:
        Returns the default feature model factory.

      • getDefaultFactoryForPath

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getDefaultFactoryForPath(java.lang.String path)
                                                     throws ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException
        Returns the currently set default factory for the given path (if none is specified an instance of the default factory is returned).

        Important Note: If possible, use getFactory(String, IPersistentFormat) or getFactory(IFeatureModel) instead to ensure that the correct factory is used for the underlying feature model file.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        Returns the default feature model factory for a certain path.
        Throws:
        NoSuchExtensionException
        ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException

      • getFactory

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getFactory(java.lang.String path,
                                              IPersistentFormat<IFeatureModel> format)
                                       throws ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException
        Returns the feature model factory for the given path and format. (if none is specified an instance of the default factory is returned).
        Parameters:
        path -
        format -
        Returns:
        Returns the feature model factory for a certain path and format.
        Throws:
        NoSuchExtensionException
        ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException

      • getDefaultFactoryForFormat

        public static IFeatureModelFactory getDefaultFactoryForFormat(IPersistentFormat<IFeatureModel> format)
                                                       throws ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException
        Returns the currently set default factory for the given format (if none is specified an instance of the default factory is returned).

        Important Note: If possible, use getFactory(String, IPersistentFormat) or getFactory(IFeatureModel) instead to ensure that the correct factory is used for the underlying feature model file.
        Parameters:
        format -
        Returns:
        Returns the default feature model factory for a certain format.
        Throws:
        NoSuchExtensionException
        ExtensionManager.NoSuchExtensionException

      • getEmptyFeatureModel

        public static IFeatureModel getEmptyFeatureModel()
        Returns:
        An empty feature model from the default factory.
